propel.core.threading
Class CancellableFunction<T,TResult>

java.lang.Object
  propel.core.threading.ParallelTask<T,TResult>
      propel.core.threading.CancellableTask<T,TResult>
          propel.core.threading.CancellableFunction<T,TResult>
All Implemented Interfaces:
IParallelTask<TResult>
public class CancellableFunction<T,TResult>
extends CancellableTask<T,TResult>

Class encapsulates a single parallel/background function, which can be stopped before completion. Attention: Cancellation involves thread abortion, therefore be careful when using shared locks with this structure.
